title: Sell a Contract Send
description: Sell a Contract as identified from a previous Portfolio call

sell.description: Pass contract_id received from the Portfolio call

price.description: Minimum price at which to sell the contract, or '0' for 'sell at market'

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
